page.title: 11HOUSING.1.
page.content: Ten children have surveyed 88 houses in the Burntwood area in 1985 and have come up with the following results. 51% of the houses were detached.49% were semi-detached.No one in this area lives in a terraced house or in a flat. 99% of the houses were built by large building firms,e.g. Ashworth and Stuart. Most of the people surveyed lived in houses that were between 11 and 20 years old (45%).14% lived in houses between 6-10 years old.41% lived in houses between 21-30 years old. 58% of the people had lived in their house for less than 10 years.40% had lived in their house for less than 20 years.2% had lived in their house for less than 30 years 64% of the houses had a garage. 26% of the houses had cavity wall insulation.
